mapper.insert: insert into question (q_id, title, search_num, q_a_id, time, answer_time, q_dep_id, q_category_id) values (#{qId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{searchNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qAId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{answerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qDepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:

search_num = #{searchNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
